page.title: 19WATCH DOWNDERRY/SEATON
page.content: In this formerly quiet region more instances of theft,drug taking, drunkeness and traffic violation now occur.Serious crime like grievous bodily harm and frequent burglary becoming a disturbing factor in the life of the villages.The causes are nationwide perhaps attributable to television, reduced home discipline, population increase, unemployment amongst others. As the police are unable to increase their visual presence,a{Neighbourhood Watch}scheme has been introduced ,whereby responsible citizens are encouraged to note unusual incidents.These notes reach a local coordinator who is in direct contact with the community police.Hopefully this new venture will prevent some crime.The scheme is being used as a model,which may be adopted throughout the Devon/Cornwall region.
